hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set -e set -u
{% if 'skip_script_execution' in job_config and job_config['skip_script_execution'] %} exit 0 {% endif %}
# TODO: This script assumes that Salt master and Jenkins master # are the same host.
# Run jobs configuration state on Salt master minion only. sudo salt-call \ --out json \ state.sls common.jenkins.configure_jobs \ test=False | tee salt.output.json
# Capture errors from Salt. # At the moment salt does not return exit/error code. # See: https://github.com/saltstack/salt/issues/18510 /srv/states/bootstrap/bootstrap.dir/modules/utils/check_salt_output.py \ salt.output.json
# Run views configuration state on Salt master minion only. sudo salt-call \ --out json \ state.sls common.jenkins.configure_views \ test=False | tee salt.output.json
# Capture errors from Salt. # At the moment salt does not return exit/error code. # See: https://github.com/saltstack/salt/issues/18510 /srv/states/bootstrap/bootstrap.dir/modules/utils/check_salt_output.py \ salt.output.json
